rows.label: qst201404_msg0001
rows.name: Nia! You're just in time!

rows.label: qst201404_msg0002
rows.name:
Hikari and Zakuro. What
are you doing here?

rows.label: qst201404_msg0003
rows.name:
We're about to have a competition
to see who has more Girl Power.

rows.label: qst201404_msg0004
rows.name:
Oh, that thing from before...
You're really doing it...

rows.label: qst201404_msg0005
rows.name: Anyway, just sit here!

rows.label: qst201404_msg0006
rows.name:
And then, judge which of us, me
or Hikari, has more Girl Power!

rows.label: qst201404_msg0007
rows.name: Me? ...Well, I'm free, so I guess.

rows.label: qst201404_msg0008
rows.name: Then, let's begin.

rows.label: qst201404_msg0009
rows.name: So, how are you competing?

rows.label: qst201404_msg0010
rows.name:
We're going to have some girl talk.
Based on the content and what we say,
judge who has more Girl Power.

rows.label: qst201404_msg0035
rows.name: Got it.

rows.label: qst201404_msg0034
rows.name:
For the first topic... it's a classic,
but how about favorite foods?

rows.label: qst201404_msg0011
rows.name: Sure! Then, let's finally start!

rows.label: qst201404_msg0036
rows.name:
So, right away, Nia, what's
your favorite food?

rows.label: qst201404_msg0012
rows.name: Starting with me?

rows.label: qst201404_msg0013
rows.name:
Let's see... I like
Cream Orange Paratha.

rows.label: qst201404_msg0014
rows.name: You eat surprisingly cute things.

rows.label: qst201404_msg0015
rows.name:
What's wrong with that?! I
can eat whatever I want!

rows.label: qst201404_msg0016
rows.name:
It's just surprising. I thought
you'd like fish or something.

rows.label: qst201404_msg0037
rows.name: That's just prejudice!

rows.label: qst201404_msg0017
rows.name: Speaking of you, Nia...

rows.label: qst201404_msg0018
rows.name: What?

rows.label: qst201404_msg0019
rows.name: What do you think of Byakko, as a man?

rows.label: qst201404_msg0020
rows.name: Hey! We were talking about food!

rows.label: qst201404_msg0038
rows.name:
Well, when girls get together
like this, that's the kind of
topic we get more curious about...

rows.label: qst201404_msg0039
rows.name:
A subtle appeal to your
high Girl Power...

rows.label: qst201404_msg0021
rows.name: That wasn't my intention at all...

rows.label: qst201404_msg0022
rows.name:
He's always so devoted to you, calling
you "My Lady." I was just wondering
what you thought about that, Nia.

rows.label: qst201404_msg0024
rows.name: I don't really think anything of it...

rows.label: qst201404_msg0025
rows.name:
He's been like that ever since
we were first attuned, so I've
never really thought about it.

rows.label: qst201404_msg0026
rows.name:
You don't see him as
a potential partner?

rows.label: qst201404_msg0027
rows.name:
We've been together so long,
he feels more like a butler,
or another father...

rows.label: qst201404_msg0028
rows.name:
He can be a nag sometimes,
but that's probably because
he cares so much about me...

rows.label: qst201404_msg0029
rows.name:
...Hey, why do I have
to talk about this?!

rows.label: qst201404_msg0030
rows.name:
Ugh, that's it, I'm done!
I'm going back to my room!

rows.label: qst201404_msg0031
rows.name: Aww, it was just getting good...

rows.label: qst201404_msg0032
rows.name:
The judge is gone, so
this round is a no-game.

rows.label: qst201404_msg0033
rows.name:
You're right... Shall
we have another round?
